step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM AD_LINK_MESH P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG (PID) (SELECT P.REGION_ID FROM AD_ADMIN P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM AD_LINK P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(P.GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE');

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_NODE (PID) (SELECT NODE_PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.NODE_PID FROM AD_NODE_MESH M, (SELECT NODE_PID FROM AD_NODE_MESH WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]) N WHERE N.NODE_PID = M.NODE_PID GROUP BY N.NODE_PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1) );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_FACE (PID) ( SELECT DISTINCT FT.FACE_PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.PID FROM AD_LINK_MESH M, TEMP_AD_LINK N WHERE N.PID = M.LINK_PID GROUP BY N.PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1) T, AD_FACE_TOPO FT WHERE T.PID = FT.LINK_PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_LINK (PID) (SELECT T.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_AD_FACE P, AD_FACE_TOPO T WHERE P.PID = T.FACE_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_LINK (PID) (SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM AD_LINK L WHERE L.S_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_AD_NODE) UNION ALL SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM AD_LINK L WHERE L.E_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_AD_NODE) );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_FACE (PID) (SELECT P.FACE_PID FROM AD_FACE P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_FACE (PID) (SELECT P.FACE_PID FROM AD_FACE P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(P.GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT R.REGION_ID FROM AD_FACE R,TEMP_AD_FACE T WHERE R.FACE_PID=T.PID AND R.REGION_ID!=0 AND R.REGION_ID!=-1);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_LINK (PID) (SELECT T.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_AD_FACE P, AD_FACE_TOPO T WHERE P.PID = T.FACE_PID);
INSERT /*+ APPEND */ INTO TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG (PID) (SELECT REGION_ID FROM VIEW_AD_ADMIN CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR REGION_ID_UP = REGION_ID START WITH REGION_ID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG));

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.S_NODE_PID FROM AD_LINK P, TEMP_AD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID UNION ALL SELECT P.E_NODE_PID FROM AD_LINK P, TEMP_AD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_AD_ADMIN_GROUP (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT P.GROUP_ID FROM AD_ADMIN_PART P,TEMP_AD_ADMIN_RG T WHERE P.REGION_ID_DOWN=T.PID);
